lg.l: I wonder if your rage can draw what we would call bad things
Things like losing your wallet or things like bombs going off in your town
Maybe it's better not to think about it
Maybe it's better not to dwell on all the things that could happen
Maybe it's a good idea to just be quiet
Maybe it's better to just stand still...
